name: Sunday
quotes: Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week.

name: Monday
quotes: Monday, the start of a new work week, keep your mind open even if you feel desperate - find the opportunities that are there for you!

name: Tuesday
quotes: Tuesdays are what brings smiles out of their hiding places, so that everyone may share in their beauty.

name: wednesday
quotes: Wednesday will never be lonely when it has days all around it.

name: Thursday
quotes: Thursday is full of timeless thoughts, and marshmallow dreams.

name: Friday
quotes: The sun shines brightest on Fridays because it knows that the weekend is here.

name: Saturday
quotes: Oh my sweet Saturday, i have been waiting for you for six long days. Happy Weekend!!
